description: Capture quick notes in a single workspace. Read, write, and append ideas effortlessly as they evolve. Reset the page to start fresh whenever you need.

capabilities.name: clear_note
capabilities.description: Clears the current note, making it empty.

capabilities.name: write_note
capabilities.description: Replaces the current note with a new string.

capabilities.name: read_note
capabilities.description: Returns the current content of the note.

capabilities.name: append_note
capabilities.description: Appends new text to the current note, starting with a new line. Optionally includes a separator line.
